titleStmt.title: Poems written by Henry Lord Arundel of Warder and Count of the Sacred Roman Cmpire [sic].
titleStmt.author: Arundell of Wardour, Henry Arundell, Baron, 1606?-1694.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
A valediction to the world--Persecution no loss--Quem amat castigat--Considerations before the crucifix--Upon the pains of hell.
